narrative.narrative: Ural Airlines was founded in 1943 as Sverdlovsk State Air Enterprises and soon became part of the Soviet Unions flag carrier Aeroflot. Ural Airlines acted as Aeroflots Yekaterinburg sector, which is where they still call home today but have not been a part of Aeroflot since 1993. Koltsolvo Airport is its home. They operate to 40 destinations throughout Europe and Asia. They operate all A320 family aircraft.
